Reference device Mac ID.message: Mac ID should be 6 octet separated by ':' Eg: 10:22:33:44:55:66

Temperature tolerance.message: Temperature tolerence should not more than 10 degree or less than 0

Humidity tolerence.message: Humidity tolerence should be a number

MPU tolarence.message: 9 - axis tolerence should be in percentage. Ex: 1 - 99
